data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Benjamin Cortus awards Schalke a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Leon Bailey breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 6, Schalke have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 8, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Own goal! Malick Thiaw has scored at the wrong end to make it 0-1.
Leon Bailey of Leverkusen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Mark Uth for Schalke has been booked by Benjamin Cortus and receives a first yellow card.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 12, In Gelsenkirchen Leverkusen attack through Florian Wirtz. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Schalke.
Leverkusen's Patrik Schick gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Schalke.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 16, Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 18, Leverkusen push forward at VELTINS-Arena and Nadiem Amiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Leverkusen drive upfield and Nadiem Amiri gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 21, Florian Wirtz for Leverkusen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Benjamin Cortus awards Schalke a goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to Leverkusen's area.
In the minute 23, Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Leverkusen's Moussa Diaby misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 24, Schalke's Mark Uth gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leverkusen defender.
Nassim Boujellab of Schalke gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
In the minute 25, In Gelsenkirchen Schalke attack through Steven Skrzybski. The finish is off target, however.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Schalke.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 30, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leverkusen's Moussa Diaby gets in a shot on goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 32, Schalke push upfield but Benjamin Cortus quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Leon Bailey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leverkusen.
Schalke needs to be cautious. Leverkusen have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 39, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Schalke.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Schalke drives forward and Suat Serdar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Leverkusen's Moussa Diaby breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Leverkusen's Patrik Schick is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Schalke pushes forward through Omar Mascarell, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at VELTINS-Arena.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Schalke's half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Schalke.
In the minute 48, In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Schalke have a goal kick.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 51, In Gelsenkirchen Leverkusen drive forward through Leon Bailey. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Schalke are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 56, Schalke's Benito Raman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Benjamin Cortus awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 57, Malick Thiaw (Schalke) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at VELTINS-Arena.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Leverkusen pushes forward through Moussa Diaby, whose finish on goal is saved.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
At VELTINS-Arena, Aleksandar Dragovic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, Free kick in a good position for Schalke!
Jonathan Tah (Leverkusen) has received a first yellow card.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Leverkusen in Gelsenkirchen.
Nadiem Amiri (Leverkusen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 63, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Schalke to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Schalke make their first substitution with Matthew Hoppe replacing Nassim Boujellab.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Julian Baumgartlinger for Leverkusen drives towards goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Goal! Leverkusen increase their lead to 0-2 through a well-placed header from Julian Baumgartlinger.
That's a fine assist from Leon Bailey.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Gelsenkirchen, Leon Bailey of Leverkusen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Schalke.
Leverkusen's Daley Sinkgraven has been booked in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 72, Steven Skrzybski (Schalke) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Benito Raman (Schalke) strikes at VELTINS-Arena but his header is cleared.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 72, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Matthew Hoppe (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 73, Benjamin Cortus signals a Schalke throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Peter Bosz (Leverkusen) is making a first substitution, with Edmond Tapsoba replacing Florian Wirtz.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 76, Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Leverkusen take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Patrik Schick.
Nadiem Amiri with an assist there.
In the minute 79, Mark Uth for Schalke gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Patrik Schick with Karim Bellarabi. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ozan Kabak (Schalke) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Schalke drive upfield and Suat Serdar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leverkusen defender.
Free kick Schalke.
In the minute 83, Manuel Baum is making the team's second substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Can Bozdogan replacing Steven Skrzybski.
Hamza Mendyl is replacing Bastian Oczipka for the home team.
The away team replace Lars Bender with Mitchell Weiser.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In Gelsenkirchen, Leverkusen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Karim Bellarabi of Leverkusen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 88, Leverkusen are coming forward and Karim Bellarabi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benjamin Cortus awards Schalke a goal kick.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Schalke's Mark Uth gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus awards Schalke a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
